transcript: I get this question all the time they're like how do I network with people who are above me right it's a hard question so number one is you don't ask them what value can I provide you cuz now you're asking me to do homework to figure out what you can do for me that's me doing work which I can just keep living my life what you do is you do the hard work of figuring out what can you provide to me that you have and then instead of offering it you do it and then give it to me that's the game right like half the editors I have they're like hey I went through all of your old clips that are on YouTube I clipped 20 of these short reels this is what I did and they sent them all to my creative director and he was like oh this kid's good
